entry.title: Writing a New Post
entry.summary:
Naming and Path
Create a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _posts/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown.
Front Matter
Basically, you need to fill the Front Matter as below at the top of the post:
--- title: TITLE date: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS +/-TTTT categories: [TOP_CATEGORIE, SUB_CATEGORIE] tags: [TAG] # TAG names s...
